name: Client
instructions: MCP Server - Client Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

get_all_client_field_names.name: get_all_client_field_names
get_all_client_field_names.description: Get a list of the fields thare are held by the client service for a each client

get_clients.name: get_clients
get_clients.description: Get a list of matching clients by passing a field name and a case sensitive regex pattern, all clients with the field that matches the pattern are returned

annotations.title: Get all clients that have a field that matches the given regex pattern
